android.permission.BLUETOOTH.description: Allows an application to view configuration of the local Bluetooth phone and to make and accept connections with paired devices.

android.permission.INTERNET.description: Allows an application to create network sockets.

android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE.description: Allows an application to view the status of all networks.

android.permission.ACCESS_WIFI_STATE.description: Allows an application to view the information about the status of Wi-Fi.

android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAG.description: Allows an application to write to the SD card.

android.permission.READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE.description: Allows an application to read from SD Card.

andorid.permission.CHANGE_CONFIGURATION.description: Allows an application to change the current configuration, such as the locale or overall font size.

android.permission.FOREGROUND_SERVICE.description: Allows a regular application to use Service.startForeground

android.permission.RECORD_AUDIO.description: Allows application to access the audio record path.

android.permission.WAKE_LOCK.description: Allows an application to prevent the phone from going to sleep.

android.permission.MODIFY_AUDIO_SETTINGS.description: Allows application to modify global audio settings, such as volume and routing.

com.google.android.c2dm.permission.RECEI.description: Permission for cloud to device messaging.

live.stream.audio.voice.chat.cuddle.perm.description: Allows the application to receive push notifications.

android.permission.READ_PHONE_STATE.description: Allows the application to access the phone features of the device. An application with this permission can determine the phone number and serial number of this phone, whether a call is active, the number that call is connected to and so on.

android.permission.VIBRATE.description: Allows the application to control the vibrator.

android.permission.RECEIVE_BOOT_COMPLETE.description: Allows an application to start itself as soon as the system has finished booting. This can make it take longer to start the phone and allow the application to slow down the overall phone by always running.

manifest_analysis.title:
Clear text traffic is Enabled For App
[android:usesCleartextTraffic=true]
manifest_analysis.desc: The app intends to use cleartext network traffic, such as cleartext HTTP, FTP stacks, DownloadManager, and MediaPlayer. The default value for apps that target API level 27 or lower is "true". Apps that target API level 28 or higher default to "false". The key reason for avoiding cleartext traffic is the lack of confidentiality, authenticity, and protections against tampering; a network attacker can eavesdrop on transmitted data and also modify it without being detected.
manifest_analysis.name: Clear text traffic is Enabled For App [android:usesCleartextTraffic=true]

binary_analysis.title: Found elf built without Position Independent Executable (PIE) flag
binary_analysis.desc: In order to prevent an attacker from reliably jumping to, for example, a particular exploited function in memory, Address space layout randomization (ASLR) randomly arranges the address space positions of key data areas of a process, including the base of the executable and the positions of the stack, heap and libraries. Built with option -pie.

file_analysis.finding: Certificate/Key files hardcoded inside the app.

playstore_details.title: Find Friends,Chat with Strangers,Cuddle Voice Chat
playstore_details.description:
Cuddle -Free Group Voice Chat Room ❤️: Random Live Chat with Strangers; Seek, Date & Find Friends; Sing, Karaoke & Play Music; ASMR Sleep & Join HQ trivia; Grow Fans & Make Money! 

💕Cuddle is NOT a dating app, even though lots of Cuddle users chat with strangers, find friends, participate in online marriage ceremonies, become real couples, and even find their soulmate. 

📻Cuddle is NOT a radio app, even though we have lots of DJs that host live shows, play music and sing every day, all of whom engage and interact with their listeners and earn money!

🗣️Cuddle is NOT a walkie talkie, even though people call in and talk with each other about all kinds of topics while having fun in the community. 

🎙️Cuddle is a group voice chat room app, where people can enjoy anything they want to kill time and to kill boredom.

Join Cuddle, the leading group voice chat app with over 100k+ Cuddlers online. Listen to live streams, chat with strangers, and find friends all around the world. Best of all it’s anonymous and free to chat and call. Share your thoughts, play music, join trivia, hook up in dating games, find someone to match with and love, connect to people, find friends, host games, and earn money. Everything is available 24/7. It’s more fun than walkie talkies and radio. An audio version of Twitch and an interactive version of Discord! No matter where you are, you’ll never be lonely again.

What do Cuddlers love about Cuddle?
🆓Join a free random chat room, where you can send messages/emojis, call in to talk and interact directly with a DJ, and send them virtual gifts to show your love and appreciation.
🎖️Climb the leaderboards, with daily, weekly, and monthly DJ/Fan rankings, and you’ll turn into a famous superstar in Cuddle.
🏆Participate in different events to win avatars, badges, and entrance effects, which will all be sent directly to your in-app bag.
👩🏻‍🎤Follow your favorite DJ. Stay connected through direct messages or whisper (private message) your secrets in live rooms.
💞Select single-host live show, multi-host chat room, Dating Game Theme, or password-protected Private Rooms, to just talk to random strangers, find friends, play dating games to find your romantic date and meetup.
🎮Choose topics such as Social Dating, Just Chatting, Relationships, Music, Comedy, Movies/TV, Anime, ASMR/Sleep, Video Game, Horoscope/Astrology, Trivia Games, and Just Talk.
💃🏻Add voice labels to your favorite DJ: Sexy, Cute, Romantic, Friendly, Sweet, Funny, Warm 
🤼‍♀️DJs can invite other DJs to BATTLE using 1V1 PK function.

Why do Cuddlers love Cuddle?
🎧Listen, Chat, and Find Friends
- Are you bored? Listen to hundreds of casual, and friendly group chats with topics ranging from Music, Singing, karaoke, Love, Games, Relationships, Friends, ASMR, Horoscope, Trivia.
- Don’t feel like putting on makeup? It doesn’t matter. We’re different from Caffeine, Bigo Live, Live.me or Periscope, because you can still meet new friends without showing your face. Enjoy a live, real, fun, easy, and safe chat.
- Feeling lonely? We have an active community and social club, and tons of talented broadcasters, singers, Anime and Manga lovers, gamers, comedians.
- Having trouble falling asleep? Cuddle has many sleep casts to help relax you before you go to bed.

🎙️Broadcast, Live and Earn Money
- Launch a chat room with one easy click. It’s free to use! Broadcast using just your voice to connect with an audience. 
- Build your own brand. Showcase your hidden talents. Share experiences, thoughts, and feelings with the world. Earn applause from the comfort of your own live studio.
- Can you sing? Perform karaoke, or even do a duet with other users. Love music? Play your own music. Remember to interact with your live audience.
- Share your life, gain fans, receive gifts, earn money, and live in the moment!

No matter where you are, with Cuddle -Group Voice Live Chat, you’ll never be lonely! Enjoy the new era of radio and walkie talkie!
